persona.name: Elliot
persona.bio: Elliot, a 30-year-old full-time crypto trader, is known for his aggressive and detail-oriented approach to the volatile world of cryptocurrency. With years of experience under his belt, he combines his impatience with a sharp eye for market trends, executing swift trades that capitalize on even the smallest price movements. His relentless pursuit of profit and meticulous attention to detail have earned him a reputation as a formidable presence in the crypto trading community.
